channel.title: Webclient Help
channel.description:
[b][u]OK TO START OFF I KNOW THIS IS THE WRONG SECTION! BUT MY QUESTIONS ARE NEVER ANSWERED IN THE CLIENT HELP FORUM SO I'M POSTING IT HERE, PLEASE DO NOT FLAME AS I AM JUST LOOKING FOR HELP IM GETTING EXTREMELY FRUSTRATED WITH THIS. I'VE TRIED EVERYTHING I CAN THINK OF AND NOTHING CHANGES!! HELP PLEASE!!!!![/u][/b]
I got my webclient setup and everything works fine but i have a few problems.
1: when it downloads my cache it doesnt unzip it [img]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af226/s3v3r3ds0ul/Barrage%20Pkz%20517/Untitled-1.png[/img]
2: Once I MANUALLY unzip my cache files it shows it loading for like a half a second then goes to this: [img]http://i1010.photobucket.com/albums/af226/s3v3r3ds0ul/Barrage%20Pkz%20517/Untitle1d.png[/img]

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @e_bunny e bunny
item.description:

for(int j2 = 0; j2 < 6; j2++)
{
abyte0[j2] = abyte1[j2];
}

        while(i2 < l1)
        {
          int k2 = l1 - i2;
          if(k2 > 1000)
          {
            k2 = 1000;
          }
          int l2 = datainputstream.read(abyte0, i2, k2);
          if(l2 < 0)
          {
            s2 = (new StringBuilder()).append("Length error: ").append(i2).append("/").append(l1).toString();
            throw new IOException("EOF");
          }
          i2 += l2;
          int i3 = (i2 * 100) / l1;
          if(i3 != j1)

item.title: Webclient Help
item.dc:creator: @mrjad mrjad
item.description:
@mrjad wrote:

im just gonna take a wild guess here, but go to the place where you put the ip adress of the cache, and there maybe it has the wrong format, it might says rar instead of zip, but i totally agree, no one helps with clients…
